label: room_counts
peekOfCode:
room_counts = int(input('How many rooms does the floor have?'))
total=0
for i in range(room_counts):
    length=float(input('room #%s length?'%(i+1)))
    width=float(input('room #%s width?'%(i+1)))
    total +=length*width
print ('total is ',total)
